trans-unit.source: Defines the information for the endpoint resolution of a registration entry by a peer resolver service.
This class represents information sent from a peer node to a peer resolver service when requesting the endpoints for a specific peer node registered with the service.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe rappresenta le informazioni inviate da un nodo peer a un servizio resolver peer quando vengono richiesti gli endpoint per un nodo peer specifico registrato con il servizio.

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are primarily used to pass endpoint resolution information to the resolver service from a network client of that service.
trans-unit.target: Le istanze di questa classe vengono utilizzate principalmente per passare le informazioni di risoluzione degli endpoint al servizio resolver da un client di rete di quel servizio.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo" /> class.
Initializes a new default instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo" /> class.
<see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that contains a unique ID for the client for which endpoints are to be resolved.
<see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the ID of the mesh in which the client is participating.
<see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the maximum number of client endpoint addresses to be returned by the resolve operation.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo" /> class with the provided client ID and mesh ID, as well as the maximum number of endpoint addresses to return.
Gets the ID for the registration entry to resolve.
<see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that contains the unique ID for a registration entry.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> che contiene l'ID di rete univoco per una voce di registrazione.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the body of the message containing a serialized instance of this type is correctly formed.
True if the resolve request information message body is correctly formed by the sender (the service client); false if it is not.
Gets the maximum number of client endpoint addresses to be returned by the resolve operation.
<see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the maximum number of client endpoint addresses to be returned by the resolve operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> che contiene il numero massimo di indirizzi dell'endpoint del client restituiti dall'operazione di risoluzione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the mesh ID for the entry whose endpoint addresses will be resolved.
<see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the ID of the mesh in which the client is participating.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> che contiene l'ID di rete al quale partecipa il client.
